role.name: Washerwoman
role.role_text: You start knowing 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.

role.name: Librarian
role.role_text: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play)

role.name: Investigator
role.role_text: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion

role.name: Chef
role.role_text: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players are neighboring each other.

role.name: Empath
role.role_text: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil

role.name: Fortune Teller
role.role_text: Each night, chose 2 players: you learn if either id a Demon. There is 1 good player that registers falsely to you.

role.name: Undertaker
role.role_text: Each night, you learn which character died by execution today.

role.name: Monk
role.role_text: Each night (Execept the first), choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.

role.name: Ravenkeeper
role.role_text: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.

role.name: Virgin
role.role_text: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

role.name: Slayer
role.role_text: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

role.name: Soldier
role.role_text: You are safe from the Demon.

role.name: Mayor
role.role_text: If no execution occurs while only 3 players live, you win. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

role.name: Butler
role.role_text: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote when they are, even if drunk or poisoned.

role.name: Drunk
role.role_text: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk, but your ability malfunctions.

role.name: Recluse
role.role_text: You might register as evil and as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

role.name: Saint
role.role_text: If you die by execution, you lose.

role.name: Poisoner
role.role_text: If there are 5 or more players alive and the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travelers do not count)

role.name: Spy
role.role_text: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good and as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.

role.name: Scarlet Woman
role.role_text: If there are 5 or more players alive and the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travelers do not count)

role.name: Baron
role.role_text: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]

role.name: Imp
role.role_text: Each night (execept the first), choose a player; they die. If you chose yourself you die and a Minion becomes the Imp
